types.html:
éloignement m (plural éloignements)

  1. distancing (putting something further away)
  2. removal
  3. distance between two things
  4. long time ago
    dans l'éloignement ― a long time ago
  5. long distance
  6. distance (lack of intimacy)

title: éloignement
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /e.lwaɲ.mɑ̃/
